data.text: @littletonstc @AnitaOakville @NRPublicHealth @niagarahealth One step closer to ending your life with a experimental drug? Ok, your choice I guess.
@VinChris246 @littletonstc @AnitaOakville @NRPublicHealth @niagarahealth I think we here are all in agreement with full vaccination.

@AndrewJLowry @littletonstc @AnitaOakville @NRPublicHealth @niagarahealth The alternative could be playing the death lottery, get vaxxed. Pfizer already seeking booster #3 cert. from FDA. Be smart, live to participate in the future !!
@AndrewJLowry @AnitaOakville @NRPublicHealth @niagarahealth Today they said it was #moderna. I have 2 Moderna shots now. Happy to hear you are also #doublevaxxed 💪🙌

@littletonstc @AnitaOakville @NRPublicHealth @niagarahealth What brand are they administering? Some here in Chippawa were asking. I recommend take what is offered but not everyone follows that. I am double AZ.
